pr_title: Ignore BigDecimal and BigInteger reflection hierarchy warnings

timeline.message:
Ignore BigDecimal and BigInteger reflection hierarchy warnings

These classes are never part of the Jandex index so there
is not point in warning about them.

Fixes: #9189

timeline.author: gsmet

timeline.bodyText: Please do that in a separate commit next time. It makes the review far harder than it needs to be.
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: You are absolutely right. I thought of it myself, but I guess I decided against it because I (stupidly) decided it would be best to economize on commits 😆
